<hr width="100%" noshade>
</noscript><h1>CANOpen SDOs</h1>
<p class="Body"><strong>CANOpen SDOs</strong> are frames used to configure slave devices. Often, SDOs are needed as CANOpen devices are correctly configured from the manufacturer.  The contents of the SDO messages various from device to device and should be obtained from the manufacturer.
This add-on generates SDOs to slave devices at start up. It also allows to generate SDOs on the fly based on predefined list or dynamically register per register.</p>
</body>
</html>
